generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, clearly separated from the road by curbs and tree-lined areas.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial structures with signage.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are planted along the sidewalks and road, forming a green canopy.
- terrain: Grass and other ground cover are visible along the sidewalks and in the median strip.
- sky: The sky is visible through the gaps in the tree canopy, appearing as a pale, overcast area.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the road, walking or standing near a bicycle.
- rider: The person on the right side of the road is accompanied by a bicycle, indicating a rider.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz emblem on the hood of the vehicle from which the photo is taken indicates the presence of a car.
- traffic sign: A parking sign (P) is visible on the right side of the road, indicating parking regulations.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, supporting signs and possibly streetlights.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden or pushed by a person.
